translated: Verses of the Elder Nuns .🔽The Group of Fives
“The men plow the field with the plow,
and sow the seed in the furrows;
They support their wives and children,
and the young men find wealth.

analyzed: pāde pakkhālayitvāna  udakesu karomaha  pāda udakam ca disvāna
translated: Having washed my feet,🔽I do my work in the water.🔽Having seen the water for washing the feet,
flowing from the high ground to the low,
like a good horse, like a good cow.
I sat down on the bed.
I sewed a piece of cloth.
